DOC.brief_summary: It is known that volumetric response of leiomyomas following uterine artery embolization correlates well with patients clinical outcome. The aim of this study is to assess diffusion -and perfusion weighted MRI for the prediction of volumetric response following uterine artery embolization in patients with symptomatic leiomyomas.
DOC.brief_title: Diffusion -and Perfusion Weighted MRI for Response Prediction of Symptomatic Leiomyomas Following Uterine Artery Embolization
DOC.criteria: women with symptomatic leiomyomas women with known contraindications for MRI (cardiac pacemaker, cochlear implants, claustrophobic patients) women with contraindications to gadoliniumbased contrast agents (including patients with a known restricted renal function; GFR < 30 mL/min)
